title: 40 Recipes For Mother’s Day Weekend!
description: 40 of my favorite mother’s day weekend recipes are here! Vibrant salads, fun cocktails, grilled entrees, breakfast, brunch, cake and more. So many delicious options for the moms in your life! I’ve got a bunch of mother’s day weekend recipes for you! There are SO many of my favorites here. Whether you’ll be celebrating Mother’s […] The post 40 Recipes For Mother’s Day Weekend! appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: 30 of my favorite mother's day weekend recipes are here! Vibrant salads, fun cocktails, grilled entrees, breakfast, brunch, cake and more. So many delicious options for the moms in your life!
text: 40 of my favorite mother’s day weekend recipes are here! Vibrant salads, fun cocktails, grilled entrees, breakfast, brunch, cake and more. So many delicious options for the moms in your life! I’ve got a bunch of mother’s day weekend recipes for you! There are SO many of my favorites here. Whether you’ll be celebrating Mother’s Day with friends or family this weekend, or if it’s a hard weekend for you to get through, there is something here to make. I promise you can find something extra good. Lots of snacks, salads, meals, treats and even cocktails. Perfect for a late spring meal when we’re all craving warm summer weather. Cooking at home is my favorite on a weekend like this – or at least enjoying food at home if someone else cooks! Restaurant meals never taste quite as good and I love enjoying a meal at home with family. These are the best of the best that I picked out below. Let me know which sounds amazing to you! 35 MOTHER’S DAY WEEKEND RECIPES Caramelized onion grilled focaccia. The best caramelized onion dip! Strawberry burrata quinoa salad. Grilled peppers with burrata and breadcrumbs. Whipped goat cheese with bacon and hot honey Caesar Pasta Salad BBQ chicken chopped salad Overnight french onion croissant bake Blood orange jalapeño spritzer  Cheese tortellini caesar salad Chicken avocado pizza sandwiches Italian chopped salad on grilled garlic baguettes Strawberry cucumber salad Blueberry summer salad with creamy balsamic. Summer house salad with herb vinaigrette. Everything smoked salmon tart. Grilled asparagus caesar salad. Everything smoked salmon dip. Crispy lemon chicken caesar wraps. Roasted broccoli caesar salad. Smoked salmon tartines. Grilled zucchini with burrata and pine nuts. Grilled chimichurri chicken with couscous salad. Pistachio crusted salmon with shaved asparagus. Roasted broccoli cheddar risotto with crispy onions. Black pepper balsamic strawberry pasta salad. Crispy chicken with caesar slaw. Grilled vegetable orzo with smashed feta vinaigrette. Grilled salmon club sandwich with charred scallion mayo Vodka sauce pasta with rosemary breadcrumbs. Steak and potato skewers with chimichurri. Lemon blueberry cheese danish. Granola scones. The best baked oatmeal. Pound cake with strawberry icing. Coconut coffee cake. 5 ingredient strawberry rose tart. Banana cake with coffee frosting. Lemon crumb cake. Salted chewy chocolate chip skillet cookie. Giant lavender berry pop tart. Mango frosé. Lavender lemon bars. Margarita floats. Frozen watermelon mojitos. Minted mimosa punch. Lavender sangria. What are you making this weekend?!
html:
40 of my favorite mother’s day weekend recipes are here! Vibrant salads, fun cocktails, grilled entrees, breakfast, brunch, cake and more. So many delicious options for the moms in your life!

I’ve got a bunch of mother’s day weekend recipes for you!

There are SO many of my favorites here. Whether you’ll be celebrating Mother’s Day with friends or family this weekend, or if it’s a hard weekend for you to get through, there is something here to make. I promise you can find something extra good. Lots of snacks, salads, meals, treats and even cocktails. Perfect for a late spring meal when we’re all craving warm summer weather.

Cooking at home is my favorite on a weekend like this – or at least enjoying food at home if someone else cooks! Restaurant meals never taste quite as good and I love enjoying a meal at home with family. These are the best of the best that I picked out below. Let me know which sounds amazing to you!

35 MOTHER’S DAY WEEKEND RECIPES

Caramelized onion grilled focaccia.

The best caramelized onion dip!

Strawberry burrata quinoa salad.

Grilled peppers with burrata and breadcrumbs.

Whipped goat cheese with bacon and hot honey

Caesar Pasta Salad

BBQ chicken chopped salad

Overnight french onion croissant bake

Blood orange jalapeño spritzer 

Cheese tortellini caesar salad

Chicken avocado pizza sandwiches

Italian chopped salad on grilled garlic baguettes

Strawberry cucumber salad

Blueberry summer salad with creamy balsamic.

Summer house salad with herb vinaigrette.

Everything smoked salmon tart.

Grilled asparagus caesar salad.

Everything smoked salmon dip.

Crispy lemon chicken caesar wraps.

Roasted broccoli caesar salad.

Smoked salmon tartines.

Grilled zucchini with burrata and pine nuts.

Grilled chimichurri chicken with couscous salad.

Pistachio crusted salmon with shaved asparagus.

Roasted broccoli cheddar risotto with crispy onions.

Black pepper balsamic strawberry pasta salad.

Crispy chicken with caesar slaw.

Grilled vegetable orzo with smashed feta vinaigrette.

Grilled salmon club sandwich with charred scallion mayo

Vodka sauce pasta with rosemary breadcrumbs.

Steak and potato skewers with chimichurri.

Lemon blueberry cheese danish.

Granola scones.

The best baked oatmeal.

Pound cake with strawberry icing.

Coconut coffee cake.

5 ingredient strawberry rose tart.

Banana cake with coffee frosting.

Lemon crumb cake.

Salted chewy chocolate chip skillet cookie.

Giant lavender berry pop tart.

Mango frosé.

Lavender lemon bars.

Margarita floats.

Frozen watermelon mojitos.

Minted mimosa punch.

Lavender sangria.

What are you making this weekend?!
